https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Please take another look.

cmd/6g: cosmetic improvements to regopt debugging.

CC=golang-dev

http://codereview.appspot.com/6528044/diff/3002/src/cmd/6g/reg.c#newcode761
src/cmd/6g/reg.c:761: Var *v = var + rgp->varno;
On 2012/09/18 15:20:50, rsc wrote:
> I know it's annoying but please split this:
> 
> Var *v;
> 
> v = var + rgp->varno;

Done.

subject: code review 6528044: cmd/6g: cosmetic improvements to regopt debugging.
